original_text: Those people are false apostles. They do not work in an honest way. They try to make people think that Christ has sent them as his apostles.
korean_text: 그런 사람들은 거짓 사도요 속이는 일꾼이니 자기를 그리스도의 사도로 가장하는 자들이니라

sentences.original_text: They do not work in an honest way
They try to make people think
that Christ has sent them as his apostles
